name: it's not black and white, it’s velvet 00010
description:
“silence. finally silence. black garbage bags kissed the roof, my room stuffed with theo and jeff’s life,  i looked longingly to write but found myself editing. assembling a dream in search of answers. they appear in vignettes. soft beautiful vignettes of velvet texture. 'its not black and white, it’s velvet'. soft momentary magic encapsulated in our wonderment. i fell asleep and woke without breath again. I squatted until my mind stilled then dragged theo from the white stained floor. off to his storage locker to rummage through the last remnants of his secured life. he called his mum who paid an overdue bill which got us access to the storage locker. I drank three cups of coffee and ate an omelette. theo smiled back at the memories of his alberta christian upbringing. whitespot meat lunches that followed faithful pray. we talked of new worlds and a future that was chasing us. time folding up down and around”. 

dimensions: 720 x 720
speed: 60-second clock simulation
600 frames

aus/nz distribution: pivot pictures, filmink presents
